Question: This person was given Sexiest Man titles by Teen People and Cosmopolitan magazines.
Hints: This person later spoofed Ashton Kutcher and Punk'd in a 2003 episode of NBC's Saturday Night Live.
This person was featured on Nelly's song, "Work It", which was remixed and included on Nelly's 2003 remix album.
This person and Jessica Biel are minority owners of the Memphis Grizzlies.
